section1.title: What Makes Us Unique
section1.description: We focus on sharing the joy of travel. For over 35 years, we have been guiding travelers around the world so they can experience the real, the rare, and the remarkable. We are grateful for what travel gives us – and we give back through Pilav Tour, supporting communities across the globe, proudly holding B Corp certification since 2018.

about.hero_description_part2: No scripts. No tour buses. Just real adventures.
about.story_paragraph1: Back in 2005, we were just three friends from Samarkand who noticed tourists were missing all the good stuff.
about.story_paragraph2: The real plov spots. The hidden courtyards. The artisans who've been making ceramics for six generations.
about.story_paragraph3: So we started showing people around. Word spread. Travelers started asking for more. 20 years later, we're still doing the same thing – just better.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our tours, booking process, and travel requirements.
faq.q1_question: How do I book a tour?
faq.q1_answer: You can browse our available tours on the Trips page, select your preferred dates, and follow the booking form. You'll receive a confirmation within 24 hours.
faq.q2_answer: Cancellations made 30 days before departure receive a full refund. Cancellations within 30 days are subject to a 50% charge. Within 14 days, no refund is available.
faq.q3_answer: Yes, you can modify your tour dates or group size up to 21 days before departure. Contact us at info@pilavtour.uz for assistance.
faq.q4_answer: Yes! Groups of 8 or more receive special discounts. Contact our sales team for a custom quote.
faq.q5_question: What's included in the tour price?
faq.q5_answer: Our tour prices include all accommodation, meals as specified, local transportation, and guided activities. International flights and travel insurance are not included.
faq.q6_question: What's the best time to visit Uzbekistan?
faq.q6_answer: Spring (April-May) and autumn (September-October) offer the best weather. Summer (June-August) can be extremely hot, while winter (December-February) is cold but less crowded.
faq.q7_answer: Absolutely! We specialize in custom tours. Share your interests, budget, and dates, and we'll create the perfect itinerary for you.
faq.q8_answer: Yes, we offer fully private tours for groups of any size. These can be customized to your preferences and pace.
faq.q9_question: Do I need a visa for Uzbekistan?
faq.q9_answer: Requirements depend on your nationality. Citizens of many countries can visit visa-free for up to 30 days. Check current regulations with your embassy.
faq.q10_answer: Consult your doctor, but typically hepatitis A and typhoid are recommended. COVID-19 vaccination requirements may apply depending on the situation.
faq.q11_answer: Uzbekistan uses the Uzbekistani Som (UZS). ATMs are widely available in cities, and most hotels accept credit cards.
faq.q12_question: Is it safe to travel to Uzbekistan?
faq.q12_answer: Yes, Uzbekistan is generally safe for tourists. It has low crime rates and a welcoming culture. Our local guides ensure your safety and comfort.
faq.q13_question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.q13_answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), bank transfers, and popular payment platforms. A 50% deposit is required to confirm your booking.
faq.q14_answer: The quoted price is all-inclusive for tour activities. Some optional activities (shopping, spas) may have extra costs.
faq.q15_answer: We recommend purchasing travel insurance for your trip. We can provide information about trusted providers.
faq.q16_answer: Children under 6 are free. Ages 6-12 receive 30% discount. Full price applies from age 13 onwards.
faq.q17_answer: Pack light clothing for summer, warm layers for spring/autumn, and sturdy walking shoes. Modest clothing is advisable when visiting religious sites. Sunscreen and a hat are essential.
faq.q18_answer: Spring/autumn: 15-25°C, pleasant. Summer: 30-40°C, hot. Winter: 0-10°C, cold. Dress accordingly!
faq.q19_answer: Yes, airport transfers are included for most tours. We'll arrange pickup and dropoff as part of your package.
faq.q20_question: What languages do your guides speak?
faq.q20_answer: Our guides speak English, Russian, and other languages. Let us know your language preference when booking.
